name: Not Katamari
description:
A simple Katamari-like game, where you're a ball and you pick stuff up. The game only has one level and should take only five-to-ten minutes to complete. It was created for my Intermediate Game Development class at Becker college.

The original assignment was to complete the Unity Roll-a-ball tutorial and to build a basic level around it. I did this pretty easily, and was just intending on turning in this basic level. However, the day before it was due, I had the idea of making a Katamari-like game. Because of that, the entirety of the game you see here was completed in a single night.
